systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

storageProperties.Description: Specifies the storage properties for the AzureBareMetalStorage instance.

provisioningState.Description: State of provisioning of the AzureBareMetalStorageInstance

offeringType.Description: the offering type for which the resource is getting provisioned

storageType.Description: the storage protocol for which the resource is getting provisioned

hardwareType.Description: the hardware type of the storage instance

workloadType.Description: the workload for which the resource is getting provisioned

storageBillingProperties.Description: the billing related information for the resource

billingMode.Description: the billing mode for the storage instance

azureBareMetalStorageInstanceSize.Description: the SKU type that is provisioned

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

hardwareProfile.Description: Specifies the hardware settings for the AzureBareMetal instance.

storageProfile.Description: Specifies the storage settings for the AzureBareMetal instance disks.

osProfile.Description: Specifies the operating system settings for the AzureBareMetal instance.

networkProfile.Description: Specifies the network settings for the AzureBareMetal instance.

azureBareMetalInstanceId.Description: Specifies the AzureBareMetal instance unique ID.

hwRevision.Description: Hardware revision of an AzureBareMetal instance

partnerNodeId.Description: ARM ID of another AzureBareMetalInstance that will share a network with this AzureBareMetalInstance

provisioningState.Description: State of provisioning of the AzureBareMetalInstance

hardwareType.Description: Name of the hardware type (vendor and/or their product name)

nfsIpAddress.Description: IP Address to connect to storage.

osDisks.Description: Specifies information about the operating system disk used by baremetal instance.

diskSizeGB.Description: Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes.

lun.Description: Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data disk attached to a VM.

computerName.Description: Specifies the host OS name of the AzureBareMetal instance.

osType.Description: This property allows you to specify the type of the OS.

sshPublicKey.Description: Specifies the SSH public key used to access the operating system.

networkInterfaces.Description: Specifies the network interfaces for the AzureBareMetal instance.

circuitId.Description: Specifies the circuit id for connecting to express route.

ipAddress.Description: Specifies the IP address of the network interface.
